convo.title: Responding to Employee Concerns
convo.copy:
Role playing is a great way to practice your responses to employees' concerns about harassment or discrimination. In this next activity, employees will approach you with concerns or complaints that may relate to a protected characteristic. What you say can make a difference. It is important to understand how to be empathetic while still following your organization's anti-harassment and discrimination policy.

Your goal in this activity is to select the most appropriate responses. Good luck! Click a person to begin.

outro.body: You have successfully completed all four conversations. Remember, you are required to speak to the appropriate personnel if you suspect harassment or discrimination is occurring.
